website_summaries.verdict: If you fry on a regular basis, this extra-large basket fryer is a great option.
pros: Has an indicator light for when oil is ready to use
cons: The magnetic plug (which is a safety feature) can become disconnected if the unit is bumped

customer_reviews.title: worked for two months
customer_reviews.text: I used this deep fryer every day. I used it to cook my dinner every night. Some days I also used it to cook my lunch. I changed the oil once a week. After two months it would no longer heat the oil. I can't cook food in room temperature oil. At that point I went to a local store and purchased a Farberware 4L deep fryer, model 201639 (amazon doesn't allow retailer names in comments but think of a big yellow asterisk).
customer_reviews.author: x59htes

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this item one time and it did indeed work. However, we went to use it a second time and it would not turn on. I followed all of the troubleshooting that the manual recommends. The reset button got jammed. I wrote the company ( which says they will respond within 48 hours). Within the email I asked for more help with the product and/or a credit for the product with not an email back. (It's been more than a week) So ultimately, if you would like to spend your hard earned money on something that only works once go ahead, dont expect any customer service or a functional product from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of got this sooner . Heats up fast keeps temp. Five stars all day .the pic is hot Cheetos chicken tenders .
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no more soggy food!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fryer. It holds a lot of oil and has three baskets, one large and two smaller ones. It is easy to use and has a temperature dial and timer. It is easy to clean and store. I am very happy with this purchase. It makes life simpler for me! I love fried shrimp, onion rings, etc. It is great on the days that I work long hours and want something fast. It heats up in no time and lets me know when the food is finished cooking. It cooks well, no soggy foods. I let the oil cool after I am done and then put it back into the original container. It comes apart for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnice E. Forshey

customer_reviews.title: This deep fryer is 100 degrees off! Cheap and useless.
customer_reviews.text: This is only the third time using this deep fryer, and it's already failing. Today I was frying some steak fries, and they just wouldn't brown. The temperature knob was turned all the way up to 375 and the indicator light indicated that the oil was at 375. But the fries were just kind of bubbling and nothing was happening. So, I got my deep fryer thermometer, and sure enough, the oil was only at 250 degrees!!! Very disappointing. It's past the return period, so I can't even return it. Might just throw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fair

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great fryer! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I DIDN'T RECEIVE ANYTHING FOR MY REVIEW. This is a awesome fryer and an even better company that stands behind what they sell. It's just the right size to fit on the counter and works perfectly for so many things I have always wanted to make. Deep fried Oreo's, donut holes, deep fried Mac and cheese balls, just to name a few. Everything comes out perfect. I definitely have recommended this to my friends and I hope this review helps you decide.
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: ... on deep fryers and found this to be the best one. It is a good size but not ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on deep fryers and found this to be the best one. It is a good size but not too large that it takes your kitchen over. The different size baskets is perfect for parties or deep frying different items. I highly recommend this product when choosing between the other comparable options. The stainless steel has not rusted and everything is still in good condition 5 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: great fryer thats easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I am a chef by trade , and love this fryer and all the different size baskets that came with it. very easy to use and clean when I have to. have been looking for a decent fryer around the stores for a while and passed on them. saw this one night as my other was getting old and chanced it. only wish the baskets were deeper but you have options and it heats up fast and tells you. very easy to clean as it all goes on the top shelf of my dishwasher. abit bulky to store but worth it as we use it weekly
customer_reviews.author: giggles

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only used the deep fryer once so I will update my review in the figure if things change but so far I’m not mad at this fryer. It held the temperature well and food came out crispy and not greasy. I’ve worked in restaurants so I wasn’t really expecting it to perform well but I was surprised that it cooked pretty well. Filtering the oil and lack of cleaning directions are really why I’m giving this fryer a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: You Have to Turn the Chicken
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It seems that it may not quite get up the temperature that the dial is set too. It is wider, but sometimes not deep enough. Fried chicken sometimes has to be turned over because it does not completely submerse into the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER 1 MONTH OF MINIMAL USE!
customer_reviews.text: Had the product for less than 2 months and it's not working well and the basket handle is broken. I had bought it ahead of time for a gift so it's really only been in use about 1 month, but because it's been 2 months since I ordered it there is no option for return or product support of any kind. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS if you want something that lasts or that has good product support. Disappointed in the amount of time Amazon allows for making returns or getting help with defective products.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cutting off
customer_reviews.text: Would keep cutting off while in use. Mom had to put a folded piece of paper towel in the back just to try to keep the mechanism attached so it wouldn't turn off. That only worked some of the time. She didn't try to use it until day 58, so didn't have time to return in within 60 days. Basically, it started out sucky and was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: This SECURA has burned up the cord. Burned completely ...
customer_reviews.text: This SECURA has burned up the cord. Burned completely through from the back too the front. It’s melted.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Deep fry like a pro.
customer_reviews.text: After making a mess trying to fry things in our kitchen with regular pots, I decided it was time to upgrade our kitchen with a real deep fryer and this one is no joke. It gets the oil hot very quickly and has frying baskets which can come out of the oil as soon as the food is ready. It really cuts down on the mess and cooking time with frying foods and opens new doors for our cooking ambitions. It's like having a restaurant quality fryer at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but beware of the baskets!
customer_reviews.text: The baskets are not very sturdy. I was frying chicken. The handle medal part came apart from the plastic handle. The basket dropped back into the fryer splashing hot grease every where. That is a safety hazard! I looked at the basket and the medal holder inside the basket was spread apart. I only used it twice! Secondly, the food sticks to the baskets if you make your own batter. However, it cooks very well and my food turn out very nice. I would have given it a 5 star if it wasn’t for the basket and hand grip being defective after only using it twice.
customer_reviews.author: DCook

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My kids love to oil fry certain foods and kept making a mess using our sauce pans, which was a problem because they didn't have precise temp control and always got the oil too hot making a smoky mess, splattered the stove top and left a general mess. I finally got this and it worked well. Kept the temperature right where it needed to be, didn't smoke, kept the splatter to a minimum and better result with the baskets.
customer_reviews.author: txjohn

customer_reviews.title: Fried Food Fix
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting your fried food fix. It cooks the food, but might take longer than expected as the heating element doesn't seem to stay hot for long periods of time and doesn't always get the oil up to preferred cooking temp. The other thing to note is that there is no heating protection on the bottom of the unit, so be mindful of the surface you are setting it on as it does get hot on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Grenz

customer_reviews.title: FIRE Hazard. cord and back unit melted where they connect.
customer_reviews.text: bigger then my old 4l deep fryer, or to say its longer and wider but not as deep. still i like it more. im able to deep fry 6-8 chicken drum sticks. only problem with mine is it shuts off 3-8 minutes before timer reaches zero. update: 4/7/2020 i use this deep fryer 2-5 times a week. couldn't get the cord off after using it and found that the cord melted to the back unit where they connect. this is a FIRE Hazard. i toke it apart and found that the inside also melted. i will not recommend anyone buying this. my previous deep fry didn't have this problem. i would add photo if i can.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thao

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to use. Cooks well. Make sure to buy at least a gallon of the oil of your choice as it holds a lot. Only down side is that the plastic knob for the timer is not able to withstand much use. The first time we tried to turn off timer after use it broke and made turning it on in the future difficult. Wish that the company would supply a replacement as that would be greatly appreciated as it was a gift for my son. We just have to let timer run out on its own now.
customer_reviews.author: Gfreeman4606

customer_reviews.title: This product has an electrical issue...
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t buy this product it has electrical problems sometimes it works sometimes it don’t work when it works it works great if it don’t have issues I’m not saying everyone will have issues and the item won’t work for you it’s just not the item for me I wouldn’t recommend this product because I only had for few months and barely use it and it has issues already I’m afraid to hook this item up because it may cause a fire. But please try at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: MizzBossy

customer_reviews.title: The Deep Fryer stopped working after only two uses.
customer_reviews.text: The fryer worked fine earlier this summer when we had a chance (fish caught) to use it. It was used only two times due to the lack of fish caught. This past month, we were going to use it again. In turning the temperature up and turning on the timer, we could hear the timer clicking, however the unit does not heat up. What is the policy for the return or refund for this Deep Fryer that is apparently defective? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Summitman

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought a smaller single basket fryer.
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 20 minutes to heat, much longer than our previous fryer. I don't like that the timer has to be set in order to heat the oil. I would have preferred a divided basket, but those fryers are way too wide. I think this fryer is wide enough that they could have fit a steel divider with 2 separate heating element/knows. Cooks well, but I might as well have gotten a smaller single fryer like our old one, since most of our foods don't fry at the same temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Marie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to fry Filipino eggrolls (lumpia shanghai) and at high setting and 10mins, the eggrolls come out perfect golden brown! I haven't used it to fry anything else. Regarding maintenance - it doesn't have a drain valve, but the heating section comes of easily so you can tilt-drain the tub. A couple missses - it would be nice if it had a spout lip so it's easier to pour. Also, it would be nicer if it had two separate tubs so if you only want to cook a small portion, you don't have to waste time and energy having to heat one big tub. 3.5* for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sana Benigno

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: It's a big fryer for home use. It takes too long for the oil to heat up. On my 3rd use, the handle came off from the big basket even though I hadn't filled the basket with a heavy load. Just 5 frog legs. Thank goodness I had BBQ Grill heat proof glove on, otherwise my hand would've burnt from the boiling oil when the basket fell back into the fryer. It broke at the soldered point rendering it useless. I still have the 2 small baskets but I don't trust it anymore. I'm sure they will have the same fate after couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fish and chips, nuf said
customer_reviews.text: Ooooo but I will say more! Ha! I *might* have bought this for the sole purpose of making and then consuming crispy fried fish. Pros: 3 baskets come with this fryer, 2 small and 1 large. Perfect size for feeding a small group or in my case a large family. Even consistent cooking. being able to make and then eat restaurant quality fried food at home. Cons: The instructions on assembly were non existent. Being able to cook and then eat restaurant quality fried food at home.< Pro and also a Con.
customer_reviews.author: InkedApple83

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Got my fryer back in 03/2018 and started using it once summer came around. Had no issues, was great and easy to use. Fried easily, with pretty easy clean up. However even with minimal use, maybe 5 times a month since then I was expecting quality that would last for more than 10 months. Fryer will no longer heat up even after reading the manual trying to troubleshoot and reset. Will not likely purchase my replacement from this same company.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: not reccomended
customer_reviews.text: We were having a 50s party making French frys and the cord kept falling out because its magnetic vs plug in . Had I known that I would not have bought it. It also kept tripping our breaker, takes a lot of power. Other then that when it was working it was great!
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have the ability to do continuous frying?  Hello?????.
customer_reviews.text: Really? The first time I use it. And after the first batch of fried chicken. It will not register.. and heat up agin?.. I now have to bring out the trusty fring pan. To finish the job. Thanks for nothing!. Wish I could get my money back. Not worth it.. what a piece of crap. Amazon are you listening. Would like my money back. The cord to the appliance doesn't even fit?????
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schnur

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to find that after leaving the basket soaking overnight ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that after leaving the basket soaking overnight for cleaning many rust spots appeared. I was abled to SoS most of them off but I guess stainless is just not what it used to be. Other than that it's worked very well. The outer shell stays cool to the touch and it is relatively easy to clean. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Scharf

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great...
customer_reviews.text: Aside from it being easy to use, I am not a fan of it...everytime I use it, food sticks to the basket...who wants fried anything with part of the crispness missing? Plus it takes entirely too much oil...i don't fry that often and its hard to strain and save the oil for later, so I've wasted $12 worth of oil on one meal....no thank you...I don't really want to bash the fryer, I just personally think I didn't need one this big for two people. Totally a family fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Bats' Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The fryer was great the first and second time I use it but the third time it put out toxic air that stings and burn eyes, the smell so bad in the whole house that everyone eyes sting and burn, now I use it outside, do not cook it inside it bad. All you need is extension cord plug and long enough to reach outside to be able to cook outside, also disappointed that the electric cord is very short and easy pops out, but it’s cook good
customer_reviews.author: Empressstar

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: I run a small bakery and only offer fried doughnuts randomly as a special. I'm a small batch bakery so every time I used the fryer I used it for about an hour and a half at a time. Plugged it in this morning and nothing. I understand it's not made for commercial use but like I said after about 3 hours of use total over the last 2 months it won't work any more. Tried all the trouble shooting and still can't get it to work. Not worth the cost in my opinion. Wish it had a better life span because I liked everything else about it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fryer, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I would give my Secura Fryer a 4 & half star if I could. I was very pleased with the quality of the parts and overall value of this fryer. My food cooks thoroughly and fast! Like some of the previous reviewers, I was hesitant at first since I hadn't heard of this brand before but I am very pleased that I tried it out. My only concern was how easily the power cord detaches from the unit but when I emailed the company, they quickly explained to me that is normal. It's really a safety feature. Just be sure not to move your fryer around after plugging in. Once I got that, no problems at all. Thanks Secura!
customer_reviews.author: Ecnirp

customer_reviews.title: Did not work and gunk in the plug.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have this product but when I opened it and tried to turn it on it would not work. The power light never came on and it never warmed up even a little bit. I took the plug out of the back of the fryer and looked inside (to make sure I had it right side up) there was some kind of goo on the inside and black specks that looked like old grease. I think it was used but I have no way of proving that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenice

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly on my Counter Top
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I thought it would be, but it works the way it's supposed to, the small baskets are tiny, but the larger basket is a perfect size. I have a huge Turkey Fryer and wanted something small to accommodate Fish Fries that we have often at the house and Chicken wings, so this will be a great addition to my Kitchen gadgets. The test will be this weekend when we have a large Fish Fry so stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: DivaD

customer_reviews.title: A great fryer but needs a digital timer.
customer_reviews.text: Every thing works great except timer. Most items take under 10 minutes and the timer is not calibrated for single minutes just increments of 5 minutes and requires a estimated time setting. I use a digital kitchen timer instead. Other than that, frying and recovery time is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Nozama Emirp

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing secura about this deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed because power cord is very loose when I plug it in, it's not secure. One little tap our move in the cord falls completely out. That is not safe at all it can cause possible electric shock our fire. And what I mean is it's not secure when I plug it into the unit not referring to plugging it into my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Nails

customer_reviews.title: Nifty fryer
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean , uses old egg timer for on and off which means you need to know your cooking times plus heat up time .. is smaller than expected , takes a while to get used to .. good for small single person or two people .. for the price it’s well worth the tiny hassles .
customer_reviews.author: mama miller

customer_reviews.title: Pissed off
customer_reviews.text: I have only had my fryer for 4 months and its not workibg, the timer is going but the lights won't come. I've checked the cord and plugs everything is correct. I'm highly upset spent to much money for this not to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Toodee lloyd

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: really like this. only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because the indicator light to let you know when its reached temperature is hard to see and doesn't really make sense/its not intuitive. also, the baskets that it comes with are not stainless steel so one trip through the dishwasher and they're covered in rust. other than that, it heats up quick, its very easy to clean and use. was very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Handles Very Loose! Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: I like it but don’t love it. Food Sticks to the bottom, hard to get out. I BURN My HAnd Several Times because the handles don’t stay on. Constantly slips off. So Be Very Careful! The only Good thing was food cook fast but You have to Peel it off the bottom! So you lose a lot of your food! Strainers are very hard to clean! You have to soak them for a least a day!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa johns

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. Fast cook and easy to use. U guy should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fried shrimp & catfish came out SO GOOD. Fast heat-up
customer_reviews.text: Fried shrimp & catfish came out SO GOOD. Fast heat-up, even frying, superb job. Power light does not come on unless our timer knob is on, so I think ours is slightly defective. Hasn't effected the actually cooking, just a nuisance to keep checking the grease for heat to confirm it's actually powered on (& our breaker doesn't have to be reset).
customer_reviews.author: Anonymiss.Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: Works sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for several months. When it works it does a great job. The problem is the reset button or the power cord are defective and have to fiddle with it for about 20 minutes in order for it to turn on and stay on. It gets pretty irritating, but like I said when it works it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Pit Bull guy

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel it was safe
customer_reviews.text: The baskets we're not stable when they sit down in the oil well until the lid was lowered. Since I bought this for my elderly father I did not feel safe with him using it
customer_reviews.author: Kim Parker

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. Spend your money on something that will work.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose if this had worked more than one time I would probably rate it higher. The concept is sound, and the price was average, but the quality was completely lacking. We used this literally ONE TIME, and it worked just fine. The VERY next day, went to use it again and it would not turn on at all. It wouldn't even conduct a current. Dead in the water after one use. We returned to Amazon, and bought a Presto.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nickell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good piece of equipment. Holds more than enough, easy to set up and get cooking. Be warned to consider the length of the item including the basket handles... It needs a very deep counter space! Only complaint is the lid is awkwardly designed. Can't set it on the counter since it's hot and oily, but if you flip it over it rocks back and forth and you could burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Speterman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fryer. It cooks everything evenly, and It holds true to the temperature knob. It has one big basket which was amazing for frying a while dinner, or it has two small ones which was nice for different batches of things. I can not say enough good things about this fryer. It's a great deal, it has a filter that makes it so your whole house doesnt stink, and everything works great on it. The whole body disassembles so its SOOO easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this fryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fryer! It heats up quick and can cook a mess of wings fast. The only cons to this fryer is you MUST use the timer, you can't even heat up the oil without it. The other con is the balance of the large fry basket (haven't tried the small ones), if it is lightly loaded, the handle will cause the basket to tilt back so you have to load it heave on one side or some of your food might come up out of the oil. All in all I love it! Will buy another for sure when this one give up the ghost, hopefully a long time from now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good I guess.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice deep fryer... you need SOOOO much oil to use, it doesnt go to a high enough temp for French fries (needs to get to 400°F or 450°F) but only gets to 375°F. Overall it does the trick I guess. Will prob buy a new one soon and be more aware of max temps
customer_reviews.author: WORCESTER

customer_reviews.title: Best fryer Ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: It holds an entire cut up chicken, I do the 11 piece cut. The temperature seems to be a lot better and more consistent than the "pot" type fryer I was using before. Cleaning the unit is a pain in the rear, but the quality of food far exceeds the pain of cleaning it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky G Matli

customer_reviews.title: Under powered.  Thermostat setting inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: . It takes a long time to reach temperature and the thermostat temp setting is inaccurate by 100 degrees. When set on the maximum temperature the highest it will go is 325 degrees F. The filters are useless and just trap moisture. I don’t recommend this product for frying seafood or anything you are trying to flash fry. Won’t get hot enough and not enough element to hold the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Low quality but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Quality not what I expected but it was one of the lower cost products. The dials are difficult to turn, temp only goes upto 375 degrees and timer doesn’t seem accurate. The baskets fit poorly into the fryer and the lid is not attached so it falls easily when open. I was able to successfully make French fried however.
customer_reviews.author: Premierdoc

customer_reviews.title: I must say that this product is an excellent product! It is really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until we had used the fryer a few times before posting a review. After cooking fried fish, chicken (both thighs and wings) and french fries, I must say that this product is an excellent product! It is really easy to use, has great temperature control and puts out product that rival going to a restaurant to get fried food. My girlfriend that does all the cooking is very happy with this purchase which of course makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Warren C Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So, I finally got a chance to use this. Temp control works great. Like how dismantible it is for cleaning and storing. The magnetic power chord is a little finicky, but once I figured, all went well. For the price I would highly recommend this fryer!
customer_reviews.author: bill2616

customer_reviews.title: Timer and Auto Shut Off
customer_reviews.text: My first look before I used it would have been 3 stars but after using it for about 2 weeks. I give a 5 star. Why I was cooking coconut shrimps. After the last batch I went out came back and realized I never turned the deep fryer off but I did have it on a timer. If it wasn't for the auto shut off I dont know what would have happened. So 5 star plus
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: it's ok. only problems is it isn't always easy to get it to turn on, then when it is on the oil will not heat up unless the timer in turned on. beyond those issues it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I swear this makes boneless chicken wings better than any I have had from the restaurants. Super easy to use, and love I can either use the one big tray or the two smaller ones to change things up. Only issue is that it does require a lot of peanut oil to use, and it goes bad after a few meals, so can be kind of expensive. Overall good fryer though
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was at a friend's house and he was cooking in one of these so I bought myself one as well because mine was getting old. I like this because you have the option to use different baskets which is exactly what I wanted to be able to do. So far so good. If anything changes I'll change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: My Secura Deep Fryer is dependable
customer_reviews.text: I do not like Secura Deep Fryer, I love it. It's easy to use timer and temperature; temperature gage is accurate for frying. This is my 2nd deep fryer, I just order a 3rd for my eldest daughter for Christmas. I would and have recommended this product. By the way customer service, help me quick and effectively, when I had a power surge and deep fryer would not come on. My Secura Deep Fryer has a reset button on the back! I did not know. A dinner savior.
customer_reviews.author: FORD

customer_reviews.title: It worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Great 👍 I don't have a close up photo but we used the fryer for a fish fry for a small gathering. My husband fried fish, shrimp, and French fries. It worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mizdmc

customer_reviews.title: You cannot fry for longer than 40 minutes I had it 45 and it does not work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on July 28th of 2020 and it is now September 4th 2020 I have used it about 10 times and it just stopped working last night so I am really disappointed and I will never purchase another product from this company and I did follow all the directions there was no error on my part and I don't write reviews ever I just felt that I needed to write this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control is magnificent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the temperature control and timer knobs. I love the removable electronic control unit, this helps to eliminate electrical shocks and water getting into the electrical port. My chicken tenders and fries were perfectly golden🥰! This unit is easy to clean, considering nothing with oil is easy to clean🤣!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lianess

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The first one had to be replaced by Amazon, it just stopped working. The cord falls out of the fryer very easily. if this one breaks down I will request my money back instead and purchase a different model. Amazon's customer service is the best online retailer though and I enjoy purchasing from them,
customer_reviews.author: NJ-WA Poetess

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, have used it a few times.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. Wish it got a little warmer to speed up cooking time. I like how it has 1 big basket and 2 small baskets in case you are making different things. Lid is nice, doesn't make a huge mess. Holds a lot of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Groschup

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use. It doesn't take a long time for the food to cook. The product works wonderfully and I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fryer. Had been wanting a deep fryer for years. Love the convenience of being able to whip up a nice good ol fried meal in a matter of minutes. No spills or splatters and easy clean up. Love the different basket sizes. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ali B

customer_reviews.title: Forget airfryers!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing tastes better than deep fried! Easy to use and easy to clean. Would be nice to have a fabric cover when not in use. Also, additional filters would be great. I use this more than I use my toaster. Question: if it's fried in corn oil, does that make it a vegetable?
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Natale

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this deep fryer but it just died and after only having it a year it wasn't worth it for the 15 times or so I used it in that year. So sad that things are not built to last!
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: great home unit
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pleased with this unit. I've used this a couple dozen times since receiving. It has worked well with no real issues. The only minor issue is that I'm not thrilled with the magnetic power cord. It can fall off fairly easy but it's just an occasional nuisance not an issue. cooks well, holds temp well and large enough for a few servings. As long as it meets the longevity test I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Art Saiz

customer_reviews.title: Very bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: The deep fryer worked great for 6 months then died one day I tried to claim the manufacturers warranty, I filled out the claim online and talked to a customer service rep and I didn't get any response at all they said they would send the stuff necessary and never did. I was a constant loop every time I did it three times. No response, They don't stand by their products or warranties.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he loves it!. He has already planned the family fish fry. The different basket sizes are perfect for our family. I would definitely recommend this fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sinyard

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The fryer nearly caught fire where the plug inserts into the female plug. It got so hot the heavy plastic melted and ruined the female plug. I would think that company would want to refund me and see what happened to prevent future lawsuits
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy....especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this fyer. Took us a few weeks to get it out of the box, but the first time we used it, it was super easy! We made Maggiano's Little Italy's Zucchini Friite recipe and it turned out PERFECT! A little trick to be mindful of is that the timer has to be on for it to heat to temp, it's easy to think you just turn the temp knob to hear it up. Love having the different size baskets and the cover to prevent splattering. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M. Stocker

customer_reviews.title: It's time to fry
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a timely manner. Item was exactly as described. I have not yet used this product but did test the controls and it worked as advertised. I gave a 4 star rating instead of 5 due to the fact that I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: william d grainger

customer_reviews.title: Short cord and timer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product at least once a month or more. Wings are a staple in this house. The duel basket system is kinda useless though since they’re so small. Unless you’re frying for one, it’s not enough. The only other draw back is the timer and short cord. Other than that, it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the option of different baskets and having only one heating element! I previously owned a double fry basket fryer that had 2 heating elements but couldn’t use them both at the same time because it pulled too much power and flipped my breaker every time so I knew to look for one with a single heating element! Also love the metal lid so it doesn’t warp from the heat! Heating element can be removed for easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timer vs. Timed heat
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I cook for a family of 5 and the size is perfect. I love the fact that I can cook two items at the same time or one huge basket of one item. My only complaint would be that the timer isn't actually a timer for food (I discovered this the hard way) but a timer for the heat source. Be sure if you are cooking and the timer goes off that you turn it back on or you will have oil soaked food. I would definitely recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer King

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: It was working great for a while, but haven't even had it a year and the cord magnetic back of the cord came off and the won't turn on at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Vyolet

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this fryer. It is large enough to fry a lot. This is my third fryer and it is the best one so far. It works really well. So far I have only used the large basket. I'm sure the two smaller ones will work just as well. It took me a while to figure out that you have to use the timer to get it to turn on but that really isn't a problem. I highly recommend this fryer
customer_reviews.author: maggie2853

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fryer for my husband and he absolutely loves it. We have only had it a couple of weeks and he has used it a lot. I wish I would have found it sooner for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the cook in the house and loves frying things. I got this for his birthday and he is in love with it. Actually, we are all in love with it. He makes different fried foods and it fries everything to perfection. And makes chicken so tender.
customer_reviews.author: soniafwny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this at the end of February and hadn't had a chance to use till today April 26th and it won't even turn on. We followed all the trouble shooting instructions and nothing worked. Infact the "reset button" popped out when I tried pushing it. Pretty pissed off that we are past the return period and basically have a $50 paper weight and still no fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cooking capacity is a great asset!
customer_reviews.text: I had owned 2 deep fry cookers previous to this....a fry baby and upgraded to a fry daddy many years ago. I had worn the both of them out. Love the cooking capacity of this deep fryer! Love that there are 2 baskets that lift out for easy drainage.
customer_reviews.author: PJLG

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am EXTREMELY disappointed in this product. The heating element does not work at all. It won’t turn. I’ve tried to reset the power button and use different outlets and it is definitely the deep fryer that is not working. I teach a Spanish class and we were going to use this. Now I have to go to Walmart to buy a different one for tomorrow. Extremely annoyed. Will be returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Crap light sideways does not turn on! Brand new ruined my morels and had 15 people over man I am mad! Lights aren’t even installed correct!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pinkstaff

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The fryer was used 2x and stopped working completely. Trying to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Reformation Lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fryer for my husband and he absolutely loves it we’ve had it over a year and it still works like brand new! never had issues would recommend! Also it’s budget friendly :)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Trevino

customer_reviews.title: It's a fryer.... it fries things....
customer_reviews.text: Works just like you would expect a tabletop fryer to work. Temperature of oil is consistent with temperature setting.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Loving

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to cook food
customer_reviews.text: The deep fryer takes a long time to heat up oil.
customer_reviews.author: Art Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this product not even a full year ago, it worked great for a while and then noticed it stopped getting hot. Come to find out the plug completely melted to the back of it.. I was super disappointed it had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Walls

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a brand new fryer and was scent a fryer with dents, scratched and fingerprints on the lid. I'm well aware that there are other options to buy slightly damaged items at a discount but I paid full price and am highly disappointed to have received that. The fryer look to be easy to use and clean. Will return!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Freeman-Warrick

customer_reviews.title: Fry very well &he at up fast
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased this Deep Fryer the food was amazing the pork chop, chicken & was not dry I bought this one for my daughter-in-law and she is very very happy Yes I would recommend this product I will getting one for me😁
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Harris

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to turn on!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Couldn't figure out how to turn it on at first. Thought it was faulty but I had to set the timer and the lights glowed. (After unplugging and hitting every button)
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: This fryer is a nice size and holds a lot of food
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is a nice size and holds a lot of food. It's easy to clean, as each piece is washable when taken apart. Easy assembly putting it back. The lid is fine and serves it's purpose, but I prefer the lids that you press a button and it pops up. There are 3 baskets which are nice.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FRYER
customer_reviews.text: Great for making fried chicken, fish, potatoes, even pork chops. Nice large basket, temp stays consistent, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Great Deep Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for two different items. Love the temperature gauge and the timer. The lid is a great addition too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Paloscio

customer_reviews.title: This has been perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect so far. I rarely fried anything because I couldn't stand all the grease, - but this makes it so much easier to manage and it isn't messy. So glad I went with this one after shopping around because this is just what my size family needs
customer_reviews.author: Johnesta

customer_reviews.title: Make crispy golden fried foods right at home
customer_reviews.text: Treated myself this Deep Fryer this Holiday and used to prepare several meals over the holiday season, especially fried chicken for kids. Unit cooked perfectly and the meat was cooked evenly without over frying. Excellent product, thinking of buying another one for the mother in law.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: I will say though that the food turned out good and I will probably keep it only because it ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, first of all, don't go by the frying guide they give you. I was frying shrimp and it says to fry it on 200 degrees. It was barely warm when the light went out. So I had to turn the temp all the way up to 375 to get it heated up enough to use. I will say though that the food turned out good and I will probably keep it only because it didn't cost that much. But it was not quite as impressive as the most of the reviews said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Cook

product_meta.title: Secura 1700-Watt Stainless-Steel Triple Basket Electric Deep Fryer with Timer Free Extra Odor Filter, 4L/17-Cup
product_meta.description: The Secura Deep Fryer, &with 3 baskets and an extra-large 4L oil tank capacity is perfect for making delicious deep fried food for an entire family or a gathering of friends. Use the large basket to make one big batch of food or fry two different foods at once with the double baskets. All three include hooks for easy, mess-free draining and are dishwasher safe for fast cleanup. The Secura Deep Fryer features: &Temperature adjustable control up to 375 degrees F; Splatter-protecting lid;& Magnetic “break-away ; safety cord; Removable oil tank; 60 Minute Timer; Oil Ready light; Power on light; Stainless steel body; Viewing Window allows you to see the cooking process; Carbon activated filter to reduce odors. The Baskets fit securely on the rim of the oil tank for easy food preparation and staging until you are ready to immerse them into the oil. Full 1 Year Manufacturer’s Limited Warranty. 1700W of power 120V 60Hz ETL listed. For use with North American Electrical Standards only. One Jumbo For Big Batches Of Finger-Licking' Fried Chicken Or Donuts, Plus 2 Side-By-Side Baskets For Smaller Batches Of Fish-N-Chips, Fries-N-Onion Rings, Or For Frying Foods With Different Cook Times.
feature_bullets: Fry Fish And Chips At The Same Time. Our cool-touch, stainless steel Deep Fryer comes with 3 fry baskets--one jumbo for big batches of finger-licking' fried chicken or donuts, plus 2 side-by-side baskets for smaller batches of fish-n-chips, fries-n-onion rings, or for frying foods with different cook times.
1700 watt immersion element preheats and recovers oil temperature fast.
4.0-liter removable oil tank for easy clean-ups, extra set of odor filters.
Adjustable heat control (250°-375°F), odor-filter and see-thru window in lid.
Automatic timer adjustable up to 60 min to shut down heating element. Ready light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,494 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
